name: cloud4apps
short_description: cloud4apps is a set of FREE cloud services and tools designed to be consumed by any native or web app regardless of the platform. Cloud computing brings unprecedented sophistication to mobile applications and cloud4apps makes it possible for developers. cloud4apps services are accessed by native or web apps via REST-based APIs with data formatted as JSON or JSONP; this makes our services and data transmission very fast, lightweight and easy to be consumed from any app or web domain and by a mulitude of programming languages and platforms. cloud4apps services incorporate robust device security, data security, authentication, authorization, and transmission security to protect sensitive data in mobile applications.
